definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
Tsai Ing-wen (1956-), Taiwanese DPP politician, president of the Republic of China from 2016

sentences.english: YOLO is an acronym for "you only live once".
sentences.chinese: YOLO是“你只活一次”的英文首字母縮寫。

sentences.english: However, the equivalent English word "forest" takes six.
sentences.chinese: 而對應的英文字“forest”需要六個字節。

sentences.english: Knowlegde can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
sentences.chinese: 知識改變命運，英文成就未來。

sentences.english: He needs to improve his English before he can study abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他到國外唸書之前必須先加強英文。

sentences.english: Have you remained silent in an English conversation because you were afraid of saying something wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你是否因爲擔心自己會講錯英文而在交流時保持沉默？

sentences.english: we can offer: Website translation service, language interpretation service, editing service, proofread-ing service and more
sentences.chinese: 相關的俄文或英文文件翻譯及俄漢口譯工作。

sentences.english: Chinese and English punctuation have many differences.
sentences.chinese: 中文標點和英文的有很多不同。

sentences.english: I has changed a lot, so the teacher told me to sit at the second row.
sentences.chinese: 我改好了，所以老師讓我坐在第二排了，求英文。

sentences.english: I teach English Language Skills at Tianjin Teda Maple Leaf International School.
sentences.chinese: 目前在天津泰達楓葉國際學校教授英文。

sentences.english: People in many countries can understand English songs.
sentences.chinese: 很多國家的人們都聽得懂英文歌曲。

sentences.english: He hopes to write reports in English to support the exposure of his hometown to the rest of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他希望通過英文文章向世界展示自己的家鄉。

sentences.english: On my first day of school, I didn't speak a word of English.
sentences.chinese: 當我第一天上學時，我連一個英文單詞都說不出口。

sentences.english: My name is Xie Zhen, and Peter is my English name.
sentences.chinese: 我名叫謝震，Peter是我的英文名，今年8歲了。

sentences.english: If you study regularly each day, little by little your vocabulary of English words will increase.
sentences.chinese: 如果你每天有規律地學習，你的英文字彙將逐漸增加。

definition: to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
